text: You're using _item_ in the CSS, as if you were looping through those fields, but I don't see any for loop here. I think you're not calling that field properly

If it is within a repeater field, you must run a separate for loop for CSS as well. For html classes, you can use loop.index to track loop iteration and the same pattern in CSS code to track specific element.
Thank you very much for the reply and the issue has been solved.
